synopsis.text: Organization's sinister plans for global dominance. As the mystery deepens, Eiji and Kayin, his closest ally and formidable rival, find themselves in a race against time to unravel the enigma before they too succumb to defeat. The ultimate showdown between the world's greatest fighters looms, and the stakes are higher than ever. If Eiji falters, not only will he face crushing defeat, but his dear friend Ellis may pay the ultimate price. The thrilling journey to uncover the truth and protect those he cares about unfolds in this action-packed anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
